```{r library}
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r setup}
getwd()
YTSData <- read.csv("nyts2016.csv")
```

```{r renamecol}
YTSData <- YTSData %>%
  select("Q2","Q3","Q26","Q32","Q31","Q25","Q27","Q28","Q7","Q12","Q13","Q6","Q8","Q55","Q73")

YTSData <- YTSData %>%
  mutate(Year = 2016) %>%
  relocate(Year, .before = 1)

YTSData <- YTSData %>%
  rename(
    "Gender" = Q2,
    "Grade_of_Student" = Q3,
    "E_Cig_Ever_Used" = Q26,
    "E_Cig_Days_Used" = Q32,
    "E_Cig_Last_Used" = Q31,
    "E_Cig_Curiousity" = Q25,
    "E_Cig_Try" = Q27,
    "E_Cig_Try_Next_Year" = Q28,
    "Cigarette_Ever_Used" = Q7,
    "Cigarette_Days_Used" = Q12,
    "Cigarette_Last_Used" = Q13,
    "Cigarette_Curiosity" = Q6,
    "Cigarette_Try" = Q8,
    "Any_Tobacco_Craving" = Q55,
    "E_Cig_Promotions_Internet" = Q73,
  )
```

```{r Duplicating and saving new dataset}
YTSDataNumbers2016 <- YTSData
write.csv(YTSDataNumbers2017, file = "NYTS2016DataNumbers.csv")
```
